title: Photograph, "View of side altar in an unidentified church", 1904–13
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: Side altar dedicated to the Virgin; a statue of her before the reredos with her arms outstretched. Flowers and candles cover the altar. Heavy railing of scrolled leaves around the base. Wooden screen with tracery along the wall. Statue of Christ, upper right.

Same church as 1961-83-13 & -14.

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, "View of side altar in an unidentified church", 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 1961-83-15.
